_meanings:
{@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of the celebrated 
ancestor of the solar kings who ruled
in Ayodhyā; he was the first of the
Solar kings and was a son of Manu
Vaivasvata; (<ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Bhāg.</ls> {#kzuvatastu#} 
{#manorjajYa ikzvAkurGrARataH sutaH#}); {#ikzvAkuvaMSo'#} 

{#BimataH prajAnAM#} <ls>U. 1. 44.</ls>
